name: Old Desktop Sync for Alfresco
short_description:
Note: As Alfresco is launching it's own open source desktop sync, we have chosen to put all our effort into their code instead. This project will therefor no longer be actively maintained.

-------------------------------------------------------------------


This application synchronizes files between a client and Alfresco using Web Services. The application currently synchronizes files in document library of any site a user has access to. The application is built using Java and uses jNotify.

The original framework for this application was developed by Sridhar Kovuru during his time at Worksy (www.worksy.com). Kristijonas Malisauskas have done a great job finishing the application during his internship at Worksy. We thank Andrei Colța at YOPESO (www.yopeso.com) for his help with testing at a very early stage and with his work on making the application work on Mac and Linux.
summary: We reccommend using the official Alfresco sync
